text: Tichu Pathian in mi ngaikha amale akadik kha angtho thoa amin-eme tikha chongkahoi in amalar, halli hiwahi inphutna makheiya insuona katung inngamna jarra eii. Chong inthiangnga inleimajia angnga, “Pathian diangnga akadik imin eii mi seng-in inngamna khan inringsik eii.”1:17 inngamna dungjuiya Pathian diang kadik ah kaom in ringna aneisik eii, emakli Pathian diang kadik ah i-om dungjuiya inngamna ah aring sik eii. Heb 2:4
